title: Delta Faucet Single-Spray Touch-Clean Rain Shower Head, Chrome 57740
features: DRENCHING RAINFALL. Enjoy the luxurious experience of showering in an overhead, drenching rain with this Delta rain shower head
WALL-MOUNT DESIGN. No need to invest in a complex and expensive ceiling-mount installation; you can reap the benefits of an overhead shower with this wall-mounted, square shower head design

EASY TO CLEAN. Delta shower heads with Touch-Clean spray holes allow you to quickly and easily wipe away calcium and lime build-up with a touch of a finger, so no need to soak or use chemical cleaners
EASY INSTALLATION. Install in minutes onto a standard shower arm (included)
LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY: You can install with confidence, knowing this Delta shower head is backed by Delta Faucet's Lifetime Limited Warranty
description: Replacing your shower head is one of the quickest, simplest upgrades you can make to your shower. Delta shower heads feature a wide range of styles and innovations, and install in less than 20 minutes - no special tools required. The overhead rain shower head design provides a unique showering experience like that of a drenching rainfall. Chrome has rapidly become one of the most popular finishes across decor styles in the bathroom thanks to its stunning gloss and innate versatility. Paired with crisp lines and bright whites, it creates a bold, modern contrast, but it works equally well with vintage styles and traditional spaces to convey a hint of nostalgia. While other products may gather unsightly mineral build-up over time, Delta soft rubber Touch-Clean spray holes allow any mineral residue on your Delta shower head to simply be wiped away for an instantly refreshed look â€“ with no need for soaking or the aid of chemical cleaners. You can install with confidence..

Inspired by the geometric designs found in modern furniture and lighting, Arzo's angular shape makes a bold statement in any bath. The simple, clean minimalist styling is available in Chrome and Brilliance Stainless finishes.
